Clean technology.Description: Clean technology plays a crucial role in the development and implementation of renewable energy sources, such as solar, wind, and hydro power.
Clean technology enables the improvement of energy efficiency in various sectors, reducing energy consumption and minimizing environmental impact.
Clean technology provides innovative solutions for efficient waste management, including recycling, waste-to-energy conversion, and pollution control.
Clean technology integrates with smart grid systems to optimize energy distribution, enable demand response, and facilitate the integration of renewable energy sources.
